snippet.title: Abandon Ship: Sea Monsters & Doomsday Cults
snippet.description:
In the latest Abandon Ship video we learn about the Cult of Haliphron. The Cult worship ancient sea monsters and are intent on world domination.

Add Abandon Ship to your Steam Wishlist ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/551860

FOLLOW US:
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://abandonshipgame.com/ 
TWITTER ► https://twitter.com/GameAbandonShip
FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/AbandonShipTheGame/
YouTube ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6FGX1jCxMUqdlB_d6KsztQ

Subscribe to our Newsletter and get your name in the game! See http://abandonshipgame.com/get-your-name-in-the-game for details.

Music: 'Battle with the Beast' by Aaron Miller ► http://www.aaronmilleronline.com/
